definition: (of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate

sentences.english: After treating the pus, namely can swell draws back the pus, rapid cicatrization.
sentences.chinese: 待出脓后，即能肿退脓尽，迅速愈合。

sentences.english: Pyomyoma is thought to result from bacterial seeding of a necrotic fibroid.
sentences.chinese: 脓肌瘤被认为是坏疽性纤维瘤细菌播散的结果。

sentences.english: Purulent nasal discharge had statistical difference between biyuanshu group and control group.
sentences.chinese: 脓鼻涕鼻渊舒组和对照组有统计学差异。

sentences.english: Today I'll drill a little hole in the tooth for pus-drainage to stop the pain.
sentences.chinese: 今天先在牙上钻个小洞将脓引流出来，这样可以止痛。

sentences.english: Auditory lesions improved after treatment with antibiotic orally and external medicine topically.
sentences.chinese: 经药物治疗后脓皮症的情形已获得改善。

sentences.english: Objective To discussesing the diagnosis and analysis the elderly Upper Urinary TractObstruction with pyonephrosis and the Renal Function Failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨老年上尿路梗阻性脓肾并肾衰诊治分析方法。

sentences.english: A blister having watery contents without blood or pus.
sentences.chinese: 带清水样内含物的疱，不含血或脓。

sentences.english: Transplant nephrectomy was not associated with septicemia .
sentences.chinese: 移植肾切除术并不与脓毒血症相关。

sentences.english: It can also contain pus, blood, fibrin, bacterial products or other foreign matter.
sentences.chinese: 它还含有脓，血液，纤维，细菌产物或其他外来物质。

sentences.english: In this patient, the septic emboli are arising from a thrombophlebitis of the internal jugular vein.
sentences.chinese: 本例，脓毒性栓子起源于颈内静脉血栓性静脉炎。

sentences.english: She applied some ointment to ripen the abscesses on the gums.
sentences.chinese: 她涂了点药膏使齿龈脓肿成熟以便去脓。

sentences.english: The boil on my arm has ripened.
sentences.chinese: 我胳臂上长的疖子已成熟可以去脓了。

sentences.english: If there is blood or pus in the stool, I recommend you consult with a physician.
sentences.chinese: 如果大便中有血或脓，建议你咨询下医生。

sentences.english: The doctor lanced the boil to let the pus out.
sentences.chinese: 医生把皮下脓肿切开让脓流出。

definition: (of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate
